title: Most played PC games 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of playing time for 20 number of Video Games.
The maximum Share of playing time 22.92 is found at Video Game League of Legends and the minimum is found at Call of Duty: Black Ops III where Video Game is 0.72.
The lowest value at Video Game Call of Duty: Black Ops III is 31.83x times less than the highest value at League of Legends.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Video Game, and Share of playing time in each Video Game on the y axis.
The maximum Share of playing time 22.92 is found at Video Game League of Legends and the minimum is found at Call of Duty: Black Ops III where Video Game is 0.72.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of playing time for 20 number of Video Games.
The maximum Share of playing time 22.92 is found at Video Game League of Legends and the minimum is found at Call of Duty: Black Ops III where Video Game is 0.72.
The lowest value at Video Game Call of Duty: Black Ops III is 31.83x times less than the highest value at League of Legends.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Video Game in the x axis and Share of playing time in the y axis.
Video Game League of Legends has the highest Share of playing time and Call of Duty: Black Ops III has the lowest Share of playing time.
The difference of Share of playing time between the highest and lowest Video Game is 22.2.
Share of playing time at Video Game League of Legends is 22.92 , second place is Counter-Strike: Global Offensive at 6.88, and thirdly is Fallout 4 at 5.78.
The Video Game League of Legends tends to be 7.0 percent higher than average.

data.Video Game: Call of Duty: Black Ops III
